timeline.bodyText:
Hi,
Good job.
Because UdfFuncDeserializer is not used by a entity class, and just for UdfFunc KeyDeserializer, is it better to move this file as a static class in UdfFunc.java?
timeline.author: yangyichao-mango
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@

replies.bodyText: en . I have moved  this file as a static class in UdfFunc.java.
replies.author: CycloneBoy
